summary: Scientist Victor Frankenstein builds a man from spare body parts; the monster comes alive and wreaks havoc.
cast: Ralph Bates|Kate O'Mara|Veronica Carlson|Dennis Price|Jon Finch|Bernard Archard|Graham James|James Hayter|Joan Rice|Stephen Turner|Neil Wilson|James Cossins|Glenys O'Brien|Geoffrey Lumsden|Chris Lethbridge-Baker|Terry Duggan|George Belbin|Hal Jeayes|Carol Jeayes|Michael Goldie|David Prowse|Ernest Blyth|Sue Hammer|Juba Kennerley|Alain Schlockoff
title: El horror de Frankenstein
